Html: Is it possible for there to be support for async Navigation and async eventaggregator? In 4.2?

Hi James,

As far as I know, there are no changes yet in the library to add support for async navigation and event aggregation.
However, the team has been working to add asynchronous support in other parts of the library such as commanding (for example by adding async / await support to DelegateCommands), so the team might analyze this suggestion in the future too.

Thanks,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
It would be great if there was an asynchronous of INavigationAware to be able to store data and retrieve data from external services asynchronously.
